content: ✅ REALIZED: unified_mcp_server.py actually WORKS and imports successfully!
✅ COMPLETED: Fixed duplicate imports, logging setup, non-existent imports, HAS_MODULES variable
✅ COMPLETED: Removed duplicate MODEL_PATH, AGENT_ROSTER, MEMORY_COLLECTION definitions
✅ COMPLETED: Removed 515 lines of legacy code - duplicate KWE endpoints, SonarQube, hybrid execution
✅ COMPLETED: Removed 366 lines - Conversational Agent Endpoints (127 lines) + Synthesis Endpoints (239 lines)
✅ COMPLETED: Removed 206 lines of legacy federated orchestrator and dual GPU initialization code
✅ COMPLETED: Removed 82 lines of legacy functions (call_ollama_model, call_deepseek_coder_v2)
✅ COMPLETED: Fixed health endpoint to reference KWE 4-agent system instead of legacy variables
✅ FINAL CLEANUP: Reduced unified_mcp_server.py from 6,454 to 5,174 lines (1,280 lines removed)
✅ COMPLETED: Documented KWE 4-agent architecture and working functionality
✅ CRITICAL FIX: Updated CLAUDE.md to reflect KWE 4-agent architecture instead of legacy CrewAI/SecurityAnalystAgent
